short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to see the unicode fonts in Assamese even if their system does not support it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows the user to see the unicode fonts in Assamese even if their system does not support it.
-Assamese script fallback fonts  installs Assamese font (Lohit-Assamese.ttf / woff under SIL OFL 1.1 license) that enables proper rendering of Assamese script on all sites (Facebook, Twitter, Google, etc.), even if their system does not support it.
